I need your help, .

When you receive this message, head immediately to the Verrak Fortress Platform.

I called you to the Verrak Fortress Platform to help Hasmina.

Hasmina asked you to help take Vergos' Legacy back from the dragons.

I know you'd come.

Thank you, .

When I was fighting the argons, I was suddenly attacked by the dragons who then stole Vergos' Legacy from me.

I'm really worried about what the dragons are planning to do with the legacy.

Help me get it back."I'll help you."

Thanks. I've captured a dragon.

Let's use the truth serum on it and interrogate it.
Noble Lumikan ordered us to bring her Vergos' Legacy.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Where is Lumikan now?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Lumikan's whereabouts... She likes to retreat to the Cloistered Grotto of the Fortress to reflect.

You will never find her.

We need to take the Dark Path to the Fortress.
Hurry!

You've grown much stronger, .

Let's head to the Cloistered Grotto.

Lumikan is in there with Vergos' Legacy.

Lumikan has to be stopped. Let's go, !
Let's use the portal to follow Lumikan.
